idea-plugin.name: Go Template LSP
idea-plugin.description:
Go Template LSP

Add LSP support and a better feedback loop while working with text/template and html/template package

Additionally, the LSP introduces a type system in order to provide a better development experience

Read the usage documentation to learn more about the LSP's inner workings

Installation

Before being able to use this plugin, you need to first install the LSP executable

Below is the recommended procedure. Make sure that the executable is in your PATH

go install github.com/yayolande/go-template-lsp@latest

Visit the project repository for other installation procedures

Features

  • Diagnostics
  • Go To Definition
  • Hover
  • Folding Range
  • Dependency analysis of Template call
